verses.1: Tua ciangin Abijah si a, David khuapi sungah kivui hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi. Asa hun sungin tua gamah kum sawm sung gal dai hi.
verses.2: Tua ciangin Asa in ama Pasian, Topaʼ mitah a hoih le a man na sem hi.
verses.3: Amah in gamdang biakna taute le mual dawna biakpiakna munte la khia-in, biakna songte supai-in Asherah milimte phuk a,
verses.4: amauʼ pute pateʼ Pasian, Topa zongin thukham le thupiaknate a zuih nadingun Judah mite thu a pia hi.
verses.5: Amah in Judah khuapi khempeuh panin mual dawna biakpiakna munte le paknamtui biakna taute zong la khia hi. Tua ciangin ama khutnuai ah kumpi gam sung gal dai hi.
verses.6: Tua gamah gal dai ahih manin Judah gam sungah kulh a nei khuapite a lam hi. Topa in ama tungah galdaihna hun pia ahih manin tua hun sungin amah in galdona nei lo hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin amah in Judah mite kiangah, “Hih khuapite lamin kulhpite le tausangte, kulh kongpite le zawlte tawh um ni. Eite in Topa i Pasian zong ihih manin leitang pen eima aʼ hi lai hi. Eite in amah i zong a, amah in i kiim khempeuh panin galdaihna hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapite lamin kulh tawh um uh a, maavang uh hi.
verses.8: Asa in Judah mite sung panin lumneu le teipi a tawi galkap tul za thum le Benjamin mite lum pua-in thal a keek tul za nih le tul sawm giat nei hi. Hih mite khempeuh pen a thahat a galhang mite vive ahi uh hi.
verses.9: Amaute a sim dingin Ethiopia mi Zerah, galkap awn khat le leeng galkap za thum tawh hong kuan khia a, Mareshah ciang dong hong tung hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin amah a dawntuah dingin Asa kuan khia a, Zefathah le Mareshah kuamah galdo nading panna a bawl uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin Topa Pasianʼ tungah Asa kiko a, “ Topa aw, a thahat le a zawngkhal a kidona ah a huh dingin nang tawh a kibang kuamah dang om lo hi. Kote hong huh in, Topa koteʼ Pasian aw; bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong suang uh a, nangma minin hih mihonpi a do dingin kong pai uh hi. Topa aw, nang, koteʼ Pasian na hi hi; mite kizosak kei in,” a ci hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Asa le Judah miteʼ mai ah Ethiopia mite zo a, Ethiopia mite tai uh hi.
verses.13: Asa le amah tawh a om mite in Gerar ciang dong amaute delh uh a, a hing kuamah a om nawn loh dongin Ethiopia mite puk uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa le ama galkapteʼ mai ah amaute kisusia hi. Judah mite in van kinusia tampi tak pua uh hi.
verses.14: Topa a kikihtakna amaute tungah om ahih manin amaute in Gerar kiim a khuapi khempeuh vat uh hi. Amaute in khuapite luh uh a, tuate sungah van kinusiate tam mahmah hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin amaute in gan omna puanbukte vat uh a, tuu tampi le kalaohte paikhiatpih uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah a ciahkik uh hi.
